summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6145 for the improvement of North 45th Street from Greenwood Avenue to Palatine Avenue on the south; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85582, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
